plugins.name: Grady - Apply Beautiful Gradients
plugins.description:
Vibe coded this user friendly plugin to quickly convert your boring solid colors to gradients with the same color scheme. These gradients add depth to buttons, make backgrounds more interesting, and even shorten the time to apply gradients and other effects!


Feel free to leave feedback and if you liked the plugin, just press the ❤️ to show some love :)
plugins.tagline: Instant Gradients From Solid Colors

plugins.name: MagicText
plugins.description:
A powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow by recognizing, transforming, and cleaning up text layers in seconds. Whether you're extracting text from images, converting case styles, or refining typography, this tool enhances productivity and ensures design consistency with just a few clicks.


How It Works:


1. Text Recognition

Use the built-in text recognize to quickly extract text from image layers. Simply select an image layer, choose the desired language, and launch text recognition – the plugin will automatically create a new text layer with the extracted content.

Supported Languages: MagicText supports a wide range of languages: English, Chinese, Ukrainian, Spanish, German, French, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Portuguese, Italian, Bulgarian, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Turkish and more.


2. Text Transformation:

Easily change the case of your text with a single click:

  1. Title Case: Capitalize the first letter of each word.
  2. Sentence Case: Capitalize only the first letter of each sentence.
  3. UPPERCASE & lowercase: Convert your text to all uppercase or all lowercase letters.


3. Text Manipulation:

Seamlessly merge multiple text layers into one or split a single text layer into individual sentences for easier editing.


4. Style Cleanup:

  1. Remove Hyperlinks: Automatically strip out hyperlinks from your text.
  2. Remove All Styles: Reset text and color styles, reverting your text to a clean, default appearance.


5. Character Counter:

Instantly see the number of characters, sentences, and words in your selected text layers for precise text management.


Key Features:

  1. Image-Based Text Recognition: Extract text from images with support for multiple languages.
  2. Case Conversion Options: Transform text to sentence case, title case, UPPERCASE, or lowercase in just a few clicks.
  3. Text Layer Manipulation: Merge and split text layers effortlessly to suit your workflow.
  4. Style Reset: Remove hyperlinks and reset text formatting to maintain consistency in your designs.
  5. Real-Time Character Counting: Keep track of characters, sentences, and words in real time.


Who Is It For?

MagicText is designed for Figma designers who want to streamline their text formatting and editing process. By automating repetitive tasks and offering powerful text transformation tools, MagicText allows you to focus more on creative design and less on manual text adjustments.


Feedback & Future Updates

Welcome your professional insights and suggestions for improvements. Your feedback is invaluable and will be carefully reviewed to guide future updates. Please share your ideas and help us enhance MagicText. Leave your feedback here.
plugins.tagline: Recognize, transform, and clean text layers instantly—enhancing productivity and consistency.

plugins.name: Class Action
plugins.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.


Key features:

  1. Create and manage reusable style classes similar to CSS and Tailwind classes
  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.
plugins.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

138910.name: Class Action
138910.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.


Key features:

  1. Create and manage reusable style classes similar to CSS and Tailwind classes
  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs to communicate with the Lemon Squeezy API for license validation and activation.

138910.release_notes:
This update delivers critical bug fixes and enhanced reliability that ensure seamless functionality when working with component frames and complex Figma elements. The plugin now provides robust error handling and comprehensive symbol protection to maintain consistent performance across all design scenarios.

New in this release:
• Component Frame Compatibility Fix: Resolved critical "Cannot unwrap symbol" error when creating classes from frames within components, enabling full functionality across all Figma element types
• Three-Layer Symbol Protection System: Comprehensive defense mechanism that automatically handles mixed properties and complex component states with intelligent fallback values
• Enhanced Debug System: Advanced diagnostic tools with detailed error analysis and actionable user guidance for troubleshooting component-related issues
• Improved Error Recovery: Robust error handling that gracefully manages symbol serialization issues without disrupting workflow continuity
• Universal Component Support: All vital functions (Update, Apply, Scope, Apply All, Apply Global) now work seamlessly with component frames and detached instances
• Enhanced Data Integrity: Safe serialization system that prevents crashes while preserving all essential design properties and relationships

These improvements ensure reliable performance when working with any Figma element type, addressing critical compatibility issues that could interrupt design workflows. The enhanced error handling and symbol protection provide a solid foundation for consistent plugin operation across complex design systems and component libraries.
138910.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

plugins.name: PixelTweak
plugins.description:
PixelTweak is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you achieve pixel-perfect design. It smooths edges, rounds numbers, and aligns elements with just one click.


  1. Select your layers – Choose the layer or layers you want to perfect
  2. Hit the Tweak button – One click is all it takes to activate the magic!
  3. Watch the transformation – PixelTweak goes to work, smoothing out edges, rounding numbers, and aligning everything for a sleek, professional finish. It doesn’t just stop at the selected layers—it fine-tunes every child element for complete perfection.
plugins.tagline: Achieve pixel-perfect precision with a single click

122972.name: PixelTweak
122972.description:
PixelTweak is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you achieve pixel-perfect design. It smooths edges, rounds numbers, and aligns elements with just one click.


  1. Select your layers – Choose the layer or layers you want to perfect
  2. Hit the Tweak button – One click is all it takes to activate the magic!
  3. Watch the transformation – PixelTweak goes to work, smoothing out edges, rounding numbers, and aligning everything for a sleek, professional finish. It doesn’t just stop at the selected layers—it fine-tunes every child element for complete perfection.
122972.tagline: Achieve pixel-perfect precision with a single click

plugins.name: Figma to inspecta - compare design to web
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin works with inspecta Chrome extension, enhancing your design QA workflow.


Download the Chrome extension: inspecta - Visual QA and CSS editor


How to use the Figma to Inspecta plugin

  1. Install the plugin: Add the plugin to your Figma workspace.
  2. Copy color styles and variables
  3. Paste and compare in Inspecta:
  4. Open your webpage.
  5. Launch the Inspecta Chrome extension.
  6. Click "Paste & Compare Figma colors" to analyze and match colors between Figma and your live webpage.
plugins.tagline: Auto compare Figma color styles and variables with your webpage colors

plugins.name: Collect and Rename
plugins.description:
Collect and Rename allows users to easily collect text elements from a design document, rename them, and navigate to specific layers on different pages.


Main features:


1. Collection of text elements:

- The plugin automatically collects all text elements in the document.

2. Renaming texts:

- Ability to rename text layers directly in the plugin interface.

- After renaming, text layers are updated in real time.

3. Layer navigation:

- Ability to navigate to a specific layer, even if it is on a different page of the document.



How to use the plugin:


1. Installation and launch:

- Install the "Collect and Rename" plugin from the Figma Community.

- Open your project in Figma and launch the plugin through the "Plugins" menu.

2. Text collection:

- The plugin will automatically collect all text elements from the current document and display them in the interface.

3. Renaming texts:

- In the plugin interface, you will see a list of all text layers.

- For each text element:

- "Current text" shows the current text of the layer.

- "New text" provides a field for entering new text.

- Enter the new text in the "New text" field and press "Apply" or the Enter key to confirm.

- The layer text will be updated, and you will see a notification about a successful update.

4. Navigation to layers:

- Click on the text field of the layer to automatically navigate to it in the document, even if it is on a different page.

5. Closing the plugin:

- Close the plugin when you finish your work by pressing the "Close" button in the plugin interface.
plugins.tagline: The plugin shows all text layers in a list, making it easy to replace text.

plugins.name: LARA
plugins.description:
LARA® For Figma provides access to an auto-generated searchable library of your approved promotional material that automatically identifies claims.

Keep historical brand knowledge in one place to easily find exactly the language you're looking for.

LARA® can be seamlessly updated as you get new content approved, cutting out the need to manually update a catalog.

Keep your data safe and secure in the cloud instead of in someone's head or filing cabinet.


*Subscription is required to log into the plug-in. Please contact the Lithero team for more information at https://lithero.com/

plugins.name: Designmate!
plugins.description:
Designmate! is your design thinking sidekick – built right into Figma.


Instead of vague scores or generic advice, Designmate! gives you concrete, context-aware feedback based on real user needs. Just drop in a screen, describe what the user is trying to do, and instantly get personalized suggestions to make your UI more usable, accessible, and delightful.


✨ What you’ll get:


  1. A clear explanation of what’s not working from a user’s perspective


  1. Specific UI/UX fixes, with exact actions to improve the screen


  1. Feedback on clarity, hierarchy, accessibility, copy, buttons, layout & more


  1. Zero BS, zero ego – just real product thinking in your Figma flow


Perfect for solo designers, founders, PMs, or teams looking to improve fast without overthinking it.
plugins.tagline: Your AI design critique buddy – smart UX/UI feedback in seconds.

plugins.name: Feature-Labeler
plugins.description:
Create numbered badges and description frames for your wireframes with ease. Streamline your design documentation process by adding sequential numbered references to features and their explanations. Convenient for product specifications, user flow documentation, and design handoffs.


  1. Create a Number Badge
  2. Select the badge size (small, medium, or large)
  3. Choose a color from preset options or use the color picker
  4. Click "Create" to add a numbered badge to your design
  5. Create a Description Frame
  6. Select the frame size (small, medium, or large)
  7. Click "Create" to add a description frame with a matching number
  8. Edit Badges and Descriptions
  9. Click on any badge or description frame to edit
  10. Change numbers to reorder the sequence automatically
  11. For badges, you can also update the color
  12. Organize Documentation
  13. Place badges next to UI elements you want to reference
  14. Add explanatory text in the description frames
  15. Badges and descriptions with the same number are linked in the sequence


와이어프레임에 번호가 매겨진 뱃지와 설명 프레임을 쉽게 생성하세요. 기능과 설명에 순차적인 번호 참조를 추가하여 디자인 문서화 프로세스를 간소화합니다. 제품 사양, 사용자 플로우 문서화 및 디자인 인계에 편리하게 활용할 수 있습니다.


  1. 번호 뱃지 만들기
  2. 뱃지 크기 선택 (small, medium, or large)
  3. 미리 설정된 색상 중에서 선택하거나 색상 선택기 사용
  4. "Create" 버튼을 클릭하여 디자인에 번호가 매겨진 뱃지 추가
  5. 설명 프레임 만들기
  6. 프레임 크기 선택 (small, medium, or large)
  7. "Create" 버튼을 클릭하여 일치하는 번호의 설명 프레임 추가
  8. 뱃지 및 설명 편집
  9. 편집하려는 뱃지나 설명 프레임을 클릭
  10. 번호를 변경하면 시퀀스가 자동으로 재정렬됨
  11. 뱃지의 경우 색상도 업데이트 가능
  12. 문서 정리
  13. 참조하려는 UI 요소 옆에 뱃지 배치
  14. 설명 프레임에 설명 텍스트 추가
  15. 같은 번호의 뱃지와 설명은 시퀀스에서 연결됨
plugins.tagline: Simplify wireframe annotations with numbered badges and descriptions

133211.name: Feature-Labeler
133211.description:
Create numbered badges and description frames for your wireframes with ease. Streamline your design documentation process by adding sequential numbered references to features and their explanations. Convenient for product specifications, user flow documentation, and design handoffs.


  1. Create a Number Badge
  2. Select the badge size (small, medium, or large)
  3. Choose a color from preset options or use the color picker
  4. Click "Create" to add a numbered badge to your design
  5. Create a Description Frame
  6. Select the frame size (small, medium, or large)
  7. Click "Create" to add a description frame with a matching number
  8. Edit Badges and Descriptions
  9. Click on any badge or description frame to edit
  10. Change numbers to reorder the sequence automatically
  11. For badges, you can also update the color
  12. Organize Documentation
  13. Place badges next to UI elements you want to reference
  14. Add explanatory text in the description frames
  15. Badges and descriptions with the same number are linked in the sequence


와이어프레임에 번호가 매겨진 뱃지와 설명 프레임을 쉽게 생성하세요. 기능과 설명에 순차적인 번호 참조를 추가하여 디자인 문서화 프로세스를 간소화합니다. 제품 사양, 사용자 플로우 문서화 및 디자인 인계에 편리하게 활용할 수 있습니다.


  1. 번호 뱃지 만들기
  2. 뱃지 크기 선택 (small, medium, or large)
  3. 미리 설정된 색상 중에서 선택하거나 색상 선택기 사용
  4. "Create" 버튼을 클릭하여 디자인에 번호가 매겨진 뱃지 추가
  5. 설명 프레임 만들기
  6. 프레임 크기 선택 (small, medium, or large)
  7. "Create" 버튼을 클릭하여 일치하는 번호의 설명 프레임 추가
  8. 뱃지 및 설명 편집
  9. 편집하려는 뱃지나 설명 프레임을 클릭
  10. 번호를 변경하면 시퀀스가 자동으로 재정렬됨
  11. 뱃지의 경우 색상도 업데이트 가능
  12. 문서 정리
  13. 참조하려는 UI 요소 옆에 뱃지 배치
  14. 설명 프레임에 설명 텍스트 추가
  15. 같은 번호의 뱃지와 설명은 시퀀스에서 연결됨
133211.release_notes:
fix font error
폰트 에러 수정
133211.tagline: Simplify wireframe annotations with numbered badges and descriptions

plugins.name: Iconify -  Eva Icons Library
plugins.description:
🎨 Eva Icons by Iconify is your ultimate companion for adding stylish, consistent, and pixel-perfect icons to your Figma designs. With instant access to the full Eva Icons library — fully free and open-source — you can seamlessly search, preview, and insert icons right into your projects with just a click. 🚀


No need to leave Figma or waste time downloading SVGs manually. This plugin helps you stay in your creative flow while keeping your UI sharp, modern, and on-brand. 🌟 Whether you're designing dashboards, mobile apps, or websites, Eva Icons deliver clarity and elegance in every pixel. ✅


💡 Why designers love it:


🧩 Thousands of sleek icons to choose from


🔍 Fast search and instant previews


⚡ One-click insert into your canvas


🆓 100% free and open-source


🖥️ Perfect for UI/UX, web, and app design


Simplify your design workflow and elevate your interface with Eva Icons by Iconify – the icon plugin that blends power, beauty, and simplicity. 💼💖

plugins.name: Flatten to Image
plugins.description:
This plugin flattens each selected layer into a single image. It can either replace the original layers or create a copy to the right. You can also select desired format, and resolution.

Works similar to "Copy as PNG" option, but you don't have to do it multiple times if you have a lot of layers, nor export them and import again.
plugins.tagline: Transform selected layers into flattened PNGs or JPGs in bulk.

126298.name: Flatten to Image
126298.description:
This plugin flattens each selected layer into a single image. It can either replace the original layers or create a copy to the right. You can also select desired format, and resolution.

Works similar to "Copy as PNG" option, but you don't have to do it multiple times if you have a lot of layers, nor export them and import again.

plugins.name: Archiver
plugins.description:
Archiver is a streamlined utility that helps you declutter your Figma workspace without losing valuable design history. With a single click, it automatically moves selected elements to a dedicated Archive page, organizing them chronologically by date.


Unlike manual archiving, this plugin:

  1. Preserves all properties including auto layout, components, and text styling
  2. Intelligently arranges archived items by date for easy retrieval
  3. Handles any element type (frames, components, vectors, text, etc.)
  4. Works with batch selections for efficient cleanup
  5. Maintains a clear naming convention with date stamps


Perfect for design teams that need to keep their working files clean while maintaining access to previous iterations, explorations, or unused concepts. Simply select what you want to archive, run the plugin, and continue designing with a cleaner workspace.
plugins.tagline: Organize Design History: One-Click Element Archiving

128151.name: Archiver
128151.description:
Archiver is a streamlined utility that helps you declutter your Figma workspace without losing valuable design history. With a single click, it automatically moves selected elements to a dedicated Archive page, organizing them chronologically by date.


Unlike manual archiving, this plugin:

  1. Preserves all properties including auto layout, components, and text styling
  2. Intelligently arranges archived items by date for easy retrieval
  3. Handles any element type (frames, components, vectors, text, etc.)
  4. Works with batch selections for efficient cleanup
  5. Maintains a clear naming convention with date stamps


Perfect for design teams that need to keep their working files clean while maintaining access to previous iterations, explorations, or unused concepts. Simply select what you want to archive, run the plugin, and continue designing with a cleaner workspace.
128151.release_notes:
Key fixes:

Added await figma.loadAllPagesAsync() at the beginning to ensure all pages are loaded
Added await archivePage.loadAsync() when finding the Archive page
Added null checks before accessing archivePage.children
Made the code more defensive with additional checks throughout
128151.tagline: Organize Design History: One-Click Element Archiving

plugins.name: Token Swapper
plugins.description:
To use it, simply activate the plugin, import any component from any library, and it does the rest! 🚀


https://www.loom.com/share/6d526c11f63644318e9c604193e11e3d


Effortless Token Swapping Across Files

Swap Design Tokens between your design system and working files in seconds. Maintain consistency without duplicating libraries or styles.


Full-page Token Replacement

Need to update a full design with new tokens? One click with "Swap All" updates every node, text style, and color variable instantly — no manual work required.


Intelligent Scan & Replace

Automatically scan files for elements not linked to tokens — including colors and fonts — and batch replace them with variables from your design system. Eliminate inconsistencies with a few clicks.


Cross-theme & Project Flexibility

Manage multiple projects with a single design system source. Token Swapper ensures all visual assets remain connected to their proper tokens, even across brands or themes.


Non-destructive Workflow

Token Swapper doesn’t overwrite or break your original styles. Switch between token sets and preview changes without permanent commitment — perfect for testing themes or migrating designs.


Smart Query Processing

Let the plugin process bulk token changes in the background. Your edits persist even when closing the plugin, making large updates smoother and safer.


Beta Features: More Power, More Control

Our beta tools let you go even deeper — manage font tokens, swap icons, and process entire pages. Just stay in the same token session for best results while we keep improving.


FAQs

Does this work with free Figma plans?

Yes! Token Swapper is fully compatible with all Figma plans — free included. No need for professional tiers to keep your tokens in sync.


What if I use my own token naming system?

That’s okay! As long as your token names and structure match across files, Token Swapper will recognize and replace them intelligently.


Why use Token Swapper instead of doing it manually?

Manual token swaps are time-consuming, error-prone, and hard to scale. Token Swapper automates the entire process, saving you hours of work and ensuring consistency.


Tutorials

https://www.loom.com/share/3d743648bd3643e5a50b7dff7d54bbf2

https://www.loom.com/share/b3a6f11e12734fe18da5d30106fe4c54

https://www.loom.com/share/0ec7731eb20f404d9259222377f40cef
plugins.tagline: Swaps font, color and space tokens of components imported from other libraries.

plugins.name: Countastic
plugins.description:
Countastic is the ultimate Figma calculator plugin, built to help product designers create data-centric products and screens faster and more efficiently.


Add, subtract, calculate averages and percentages automatically and use them in your designs with a single click, making the data on screen believable and relevant to your customers, stakeholders and usability test participants.


A must have for any designer sweating the details of data tables, sales and analytics dashboards, finance or e-commerce products.


Get the license

(7 day trial, team discounts available)


Get started

Countastic performs calculations on objects selected in your Figma file, showing you results you can copy or place on the canvas with a single click.


Open Countastic and:

  1. Select two or more text objects in your Figma file
  2. See the sum, difference, average and percentage difference of the selected objects.
  3. Click the result of a calculation to copy to clipboard
  4. Click the “Place” button beside the calculation to add the result to the canvas


Countastic works with:

  1. Currencies (including US, UK and European separator and decimal point styles)
  2. Units of measure
  3. Any numerical values containing prefixes or suffixes


Countastic helps you calculate:

  1. Sums
  2. Differences
  3. Averages
  4. Percentage differences (between 2 objects only)


Get the license

(7 day trial, team discounts available)


Questions and feedback

Countastic requires no setup, allowing you to hit the ground running and use relevant, real-looking data in your designs.


If you have feedback about Countastic or want to share an idea or a feature request, drop me a line on X, Bluesky or Threads.
plugins.tagline: A fully-automated calculator inside Figma

plugins.name: Frame to JSON - AI-powered Design-to-Code Converter
plugins.description:
🎯 What is it?

A powerful Figma plugin that transforms your design frames into structured JSON data, ensuring seamless developer handoff and design-to-code consistency.


✨ Key Features

•AI-powered frame analysis

•One-click frame-to-JSON conversion

•Complete hierarchy and style preservation

•Customizable export options

•Developer-friendly structured output


🚀 How to Use

1.Select your target frame(s) in Figma

2.Launch the Frame to JSON plugin

3.Review the extracted structure and properties

4.Click “Generate JSON”

5.Copy or download the JSON output instantly


🛠️ What You’ll Need

•Figma design frames


🔒 Security Note

Your data is processed securely, with no external storage. The plugin ensures precise design-to-code conversion while maintaining full control over your export preferences. No more manual adjustments—let AI handle the complexity! ✨
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma frames into clean JSON with one click your design-to-development bridge made simple!

plugins.name: Margin Detective
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to inconsistencies and hello to perfectly aligned designs. With Margin Detective, you get a vigilant partner that scans your frames, checks margins and spacings, and ensures they align with your document variables. When something’s off, it offers smart corrections or swaps, keeping your design cohesive and professional.


Whether you’re fine-tuning layouts or auditing a massive project, Margin Detective empowers you to maintain flawless alignment, harmony, and consistency—all with the efficiency of a true design detective.


Design smarter. Stay consistent. Every pixel, every time.
plugins.tagline: Detect. Correct. Perfect your design.

127578.description:

plugins.name: Usably
plugins.description:
Usably: Instant UX Feedback Powered by AI


Get actionable insights to improve usability, accessibility, and visual consistency—all without needing an API key!


This plugin analyzes your design against core UX principles like Hick's Law, Jakob's Law, and more.


How It Works:

  1. Select an area: Choose a single frame or an entire flow with multiple frames.
  2. Click "Review Design": Start the analysis with just one click.
  3. Get feedback: Usably generates comprehensive, actionable feedback to refine your design.


Key Features:

✅ Easy setup: NO API key needed - Install the plugin, sign up with your email, and start reviewing in seconds.

✅ Advanced UX analysis: Incorporates proven UX laws for better design decisions.


The subscription and payment of the plugin is managed by Figma marketplace. You can follow their help center to unsubscribe.


🦄 Free plan includes 5 reviews, paid subscription includes 100 reviews per month.


💌 Need help? Reach out to the Usably team at usably.team@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered UX reviews with insights—no API key needed. Install and start improving your designs!

plugins.name: MultiText Inserter
plugins.description:
MultiText Inserter helps you quickly create multiple text fields in your designs all at once. Instead of adding each text box one by one, you can enter all your text at once, set the font size, color, and style, and the plugin will generate all the text fields for you automatically. It's a real time-saver for designers who need to add lists of text elements.


Example of Footer Content:


"About Us"

"Contact"

"Privacy Policy"

"Terms of Service"

"© 2023 Your Company Name"

You can input these lines into the plugin, and it will create individual text fields for each item, styled according to your settings.

accepted.name: Muhiris
accepted.description: Love getting paid for something I do for fun.

plugins.tagline: Multitext Inserter to save time and make you productive

plugins.name: Rename From Sublayer
plugins.description:
Rename from sublayers simplifies the process of renaming groups in Figma by automatically detecting image, text or shape layers within selected groups.


You can choose between five modes: image detection, text layer, Rectangle layer, ellipse layer and symbols detection.

Additionally, you can opt to rename all child groups within the hierarchy or just the top-level group, giving you full control over your naming conventions.


Key Features:

  1. Image, Text, Shape Detection: Automatically rename groups based on image names, text names, rectangle names, ellipse names and symbols.
  2. Selective Renaming: Choose to rename just the highest-level group or all nested child groups.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI to quickly toggle between options.


Whether you're managing large design systems or working on a small project, Rename from sublayers helps keep your layers organized and your workflow efficient.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly rename groups by image, text or shape layers.

plugins.name: Your AI Co-Pilot
plugins.description:
Your AI Co-Pilot provides instant design feedback directly within Figma. Select any design elements to receive AI-powered analysis across four key areas:


• UI Design: Visual hierarchy, color usage, spacing, and consistency

• Content: Readability, clarity, and copy suggestions

• User Experience: Usability issues and interaction patterns

• Accessibility: WCAG compliance recommendations


The plugin analyzes selected frames, components, or groups and generates actionable feedback to improve your designs. You can ask follow-up questions to get more detailed explanations or recommendations.


All analysis is performed securely through our backend API using advanced AI models. No design data is stored permanently - it's only processed temporarily during analysis.
plugins.tagline: Instant AI feedback on your designs

The plugin analyzes selected frames, components, or groups and generates actionable feedback to improve your designs. You can ask follow-up questions to get more detailed explanations or recommendations.


All analysis is performed securely through our backend API using advanced AI models. No design data is stored permanently - it's only processed temporarily during analysis.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin requires connection to backend services for AI analysis, analytics, and loading static assets.

129161.tagline: Instant AI feedback on your designs

plugins.name: Dummy datazer
plugins.description:
The Dummy datazer plugin enhances your Figma design workflow by allowing you to replace text in selected text layers with randomly generated data. With this plugin, you can effortlessly populate your designs with realistic placeholders, including:


- Full Names : Choose from a diverse list of 100 full names.

- Company Names : Select from 50 company names.

- Addresses : Utilize 50 unique addresses for location-based designs.

- Phone Numbers : Insert 50 different phone numbers for contact information.

Simply select the text layers you wish to update, choose the type of data you want to insert, and let the plugin do the rest. The Dummy datazer ensures your designs are filled with dynamic and varied content, perfect for mockups and testing scenarios.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Populate Your Designs with Dynamic Data

123055.name: Dummy datazer
123055.description:

plugins.name: Design Review Notes
plugins.description:
Streamline your design review process with an easy-to-use annotation tool for Figma. Select any object or frame, add comments, and assign a review status to keep your team aligned. Statuses are:

  1. Review Needed
  2. Approved
  3. Changes Needed
  4. Not Ready


If you have suggested for additional statuses or new features, let me know.


This tool is perfect for both async teams or capturing meeting notes during design critiques, this plugin helps designers flag areas for review and allows reviewers to provide structured feedback with full traceability. Capture design decisions, document revisions, and ensure clear communication, whether for quick approvals or in-depth discussions.


✦ Mark design elements for review

✦ Assign statuses for clarity

✦ Capture feedback & decisions in context

✦ Improve async collaboration & meeting documentation


Keep your design process transparent and efficient. Try it now!
plugins.tagline: Select objects in your file to quickly annotate and add a review status.

plugins.name: Selective Picker - Filter & Select Only What You Need in Figma!
plugins.description:
🎨 Selective Picker は、Figmaでより正確にオブジェクトを選択できる最強のプラグイン！

現在の選択範囲から テキスト・図形・画像 だけを簡単にフィルタリングして選択可能。

グループやフレームの内部要素 も自動で展開し、細かい調整がラクに！


✅ 主な機能:

•🔍 フィルタを適用して、テキスト・図形・画像のみを選択

•🎯 グループ & フレームの中の要素も自動選択

•🚀 選択作業を効率化し、デザインワークをスムーズに！


🔹 面倒な手動選択とはサヨナラ！ Selective Picker でスマートにオブジェクトを選ぼう！


----------------------------------------------------------

🎨 Selective Picker is the ultimate Figma plugin for precise selection! Easily filter and select only Text, Shapes, or Images from your current selection, even within Groups & Frames.


✅ Key Features:

•🔍 Filter & Select only Text, Objects, or Images

•🎯 Expands Groups & Frames to select inner elements

•🚀 Boost your workflow by focusing only on what matters


🔹 Say goodbye to manual selection and pick exactly what you need with Selective Picker!
plugins.tagline: Filter & Select Only What You Need in Figma.
